titles.title: A resolution commemorating the centennial of the American Battle Monuments Commission.
A resolution commemorating the centennial of the American Battle Monuments Commission.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes and commends the century of service by the American Battle Monuments Commission and its personnel. Additionally, the resolution encourages all people of the United States to visit and pay respects to those interred in cemeteries maintained by the American Battle Monuments Commission overseas.
